sense.gloss: to mind, to care about, to be concerned about, to have a regard for
to be an issue, to matter, to create inconvenience
to keep company, to care for, to look after, to entertain, to pay attention to, to spend time with
to interfere with, to meddle in

sdata.j: たとえ↑失敗↑↓しっぱい↓しても|かまう|ものか。
↑大統領↑↓だいとうりょう↓は|かまう|ものかと↑言↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: The president said, "I don't give a damn."

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓らは↑仲間↑↓な|かま↓う|ちでけんかを↑始↑↓はじ↓めた。
sdata.e: They began to quarrel among themselves.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓がいつ↑結婚↑↓けっこん↓しようと|かまう|ものか。
sdata.e: Who cares when she will marry?

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓がいつ↑結婚↑↓けっこん↓しようと|かまう|ものか。
sdata.e: Who cares when she gets married?

sdata.j: もう↑構↑↓|かま↓う|のはやめてくれよ。
